title: ‘Digging your own grave’: 60 Minutes and Michelle Malkin take a look at the H1B Visa Program
text:
‘Digging your own grave’: 60 Minutes and Michelle Malkin take a look at the H1B Visa Program Posted at 8:34 pm on March 19, 2017 by William A. 
60 minutes ran a story tonight on the H1B Visa program. It shows how workers were forced to train their own replacements from foreign countries. 
You can watch the full video on CBS: Tonight on @60Minutes : American workers who not only lost their jobs — they were told to train their replacements https://t.co/TEVe3RA5uT pic.twitter.com/x3ZTzsj0dr 
— CBS News (@CBSNews) March 19, 2017 
Some clips and excerpts: At Harrison’s company, UCSF Medical, admins say outsourcing could save taxpayers $30 mill over 5 years. But that’s no comfort for Harrison. pic.twitter.com/Z6SydCB6wr 
— 60 Minutes (@60Minutes) March 19, 2017 Harrison would get paid through Feb. with a bonus if … he trained his replacement. #60Minutes pic.twitter.com/82ZHWPCYR2 
— 60 Minutes (@60Minutes) March 19, 2017 In Oct., engineer Robert Harrison was fired along with 80 of his colleagues. Their jobs were being outsourced to India. #60Minutes 
— 60 Minutes (@60Minutes) March 19, 2017 Sara Blackwell reps hundreds of workers who were fired in favor of foreign workers with H1B visas, which she says, “should offend everyone.” pic.twitter.com/G5zPkB3Ym4 
— 60 Minutes (@60Minutes) March 19, 2017 The H1-B Visa was created in 1990 to help the US attract the best foreign grads and provide a path to citizenship. (½) 
— 60 Minutes (@60Minutes) March 19, 2017 At the time, Congress promised US workers they’d be protected. (2/2) #60Minutes 
— 60 Minutes (@60Minutes) March 19, 2017 Nearly every major tech company, incl. Apple and Google, has employees here on H1-B Visas. Media companies including CBS do too. #60Minutes 
— 60 Minutes (@60Minutes) March 19, 2017 Fmr. Congressman Bruce Morrison authored the H1-B Visa bill that he says “has been hijacked.” #60Minutes pic.twitter.com/PZSwSgBqLM 
— 60 Minutes (@60Minutes) March 19, 2017 Craig Diangelo’s IT job was taken by an Indian worker who told him he was making half his salary with no benefits. #60Minutes pic.twitter.com/oac8ntBaDl 
— 60 Minutes (@60Minutes) March 19, 2017 Diangelo says he and his fired coworkers staged a quiet protest with American flags representing each American worker. #60Minutes pic.twitter.com/icbEzD16gh 
— 60 Minutes (@60Minutes) March 19, 2017 The H1-B problem got little notice until it caught the attention of the Trump campaign. #60Minutes pic.twitter.com/Q0B2v0CLTv 
— 60 Minutes (@60Minutes) March 19, 2017 Trending Death threat against President Trump in San Diego 
Michelle Malkin has long covered the H1B Visa story. She has a question to ask Democrats in Congress: H-1B hell? @MichelleMalkin asks what the MSM won't about Pakistani IT staff in criminal probe. Try MMI free on CRTV! https://t.co/OpeoqUsW0f pic.twitter.com/yVUqOLjRMV 
— CRTV (@CRTV) March 19, 2017 
Some Senators have questions as well: If u just saw CBS 60minutes abt ripoff H1B visa program is replacing AmWorkers u shld know my/Durbin bill will correct this injustice
